Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to the sufficiency of itemization in the state budget
Summary: Relates to the sufficiency of itemization in the state budget; requires budget bills to clearly reference the section in the accompanying bill or bills where the corresponding appropriation or reappropriation can be located and requires that the legislature not act upon bills that neglect to do so.
LawCode: Add ยง53-a, Leg L; amd ยง24, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the legislative law and the state finance law, in relation to sufficiency of itemization in budget bills
